suggestions.original: To improve the color richness of the artwork, consider incorporating a broader spectrum of colors. Adding shades of blue, purple, and pink could enhance the vibrancy and depth of the composition. Additionally, using gradients or varying tones within the existing colors can create more visual interest and dynamic contrast. Experimenting with different color combinations and blending techniques can also contribute to a more vivid and engaging piece.
